database.tabCommentSQL: declare @CurrentUser sysname select @CurrentUser = user_name() execute sp_addextendedproperty 'MS_Description' , '@TABLECOMMENT@' , 'user' , @CurrentUser, 'table' , '@TABLENAME@' go

database.deleteFKSQL: if exists (select 1 from dbo.sysreferences r join dbo.sysobjects o on (o.id = r.constid and o.type = 'F') where r.fkeyid = object_id('@TABLENAME_1@') and o.name = '@CONSTRAINT@') alter table @TABLENAME_1@ drop constraint @CONSTRAINT@ go
database.addFKSQL: alter table @TABLENAME_1@ add constraint @CONSTRAINT@ foreign key (@KEY_LIST1@) references @TABLENAME_2@ (@KEY_LIST2@) go
